amendment.description: An amendment numbered 124 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the EPA-Environmental Programs and Management account for the Office of Air and Radiation by 50 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.
